home.paraText1: Oracc is a collaborative effort to develop a complete corpus of cuneiform whose rich annotation and open licensing support the next generation of scholarly research. Created by Steve Tinney, Oracc is steered by Jamie Novotny, Eleanor Robson, Tinney, and Niek Veldhuis.
home.paraText2: From the links above, you can Search the Oracc glossary to find words of interest. You can also browse through individual Projects (in the old format) and use Oraccâ€™s web Tools for editing. Choose the About or the Help heading if you need more guidance.

search.introText: Enter a query to search for. You can sort the results by clicking on the column headings.

cookies.text1: Oracc uses cookies only to collect Google Analytics data. Read more
